results.content: Instructor is very knowledgeable and it was a great learning experience to watch him debug his codes for errors.  Thanks, Steve.

results.content: Great Course to jump start you into React and Redux. Goes over how to use just react. How to use just redux. how to use react with webpack. How to run the react app with parcel. Invaluable for me.
results.content_html: Great Course to jump start you into React and Redux. Goes over how to use just react. How to use just redux. how to use react with webpack. How to run the react app with parcel. Invaluable for me.

results.content: I am using this course to review React as it's been a while since I worked on it.  I like that the instructor shows mistakes and how to fix things.  However, this course is not for someone who doesn't know React at all.  If you want to practice on projects then this course is for you.
results.content_html: I am using this course to review React as it's been a while since I worked on it. I like that the instructor shows mistakes and how to fix things. However, this course is not for someone who doesn't know React at all. If you want to practice on projects then this course is for you.
